basics.name: Jackson Nestler
basics.label: Senior Cybersecurity Analyst
basics.summary: Senior Cybersecurity Analyst with Mosaic451. Passionate about all things DFIR. Looking to make the world just a bit brighter.

awards.title: Blue Team Level One (BTL1)
awards.summary: "Earners of the Blue Team Level 1 Certification have showcased their practical ability to defend networks and systems from cyber threats through technical and hands-on defensive cybersecurity training. They have knowledge and ability across 5 security operations domains which include Phishing Analysis, Digital Forensics, Threat Intelligence, SIEM, and Incident Response." - SBT. Verification: https://www.credly.com/earner/earned/badge/36d415c8-00ab-4860-8485-69b7db418a41

work.summary: Highly versatile cybersecurity analyst, providing Managed Detection and Response (MDR) services to SOC customers. SIEM analyst, incident responder, threat-team contributor.
highlights: Worked with private, energy-sector customer as dedicated liaison, providing high-quality, rapid response to detections and project contributions
Responding to SIEM alerts that are escalated by analysts, triaging them, and initiating incident response as needed.
Part of the incident response team, following the incident response process for detections escalated by other analysts
Contributing threat intelligence and threat hunting to the MDR service model
Customers include those in financial, industrial, critical infrastructure, and local government sectors.

work.summary: Level two support provided to a non-profit health center with 8 clinical locations. Individually managed a clinic with 100+ end users.
highlights: Handling 350+ incident and problem tickets per week
Triaging incoming tickets, phone calls, and IMs
Python and Powershell scripts to automate daily tasks, and updating existing Batch scripts
Deployment of Snipe-IT asset management platform
Clear, concise documentation of day-to-day operations and "long-term" operations.
